page.title: 04Stanway Estate
page.content: {Stanway Estate}is owned by{Lord and {Lady Neidpath}and has changed hands only once, other than by inheritance, in the the last 1260 years. The whole estate is 4999 acres. On the estate there are 83 houses which house 60 tenants. Tenants have to pay about 1000 a year rent which they pay quarterly. It costs 163000 a year to maintain the estate. {Clifford Brownlow}is self-employed and has 5 people working for him. He rents the estate yard and uses his own machinery. He works mostly in the yard and doesn't work much on the woodland. He does timber contracting saw milling and produces mainly garden furniture, fencing and firewood. He sells all of his products and advertises what he makes in the Evesham Admag. He works about 10 hours a day and 6 or 7 days a week.
